events.title: Spring Analytics Workshop — Mar 12–14, 2026
events.description: Three-day practical workshop covering data cleaning, feature engineering and model interpretation. Hands-on labs included.

events.title: Campus Hackathon — Apr 18–19, 2026
events.description: 24-hour hackathon — themes: civic data, education, and sustainability. Open to cross-discipline teams.

events.title: Monthly Data Clinics — 2nd Saturday (Monthly)
events.description: Bring your dataset. Peer review + mentor office hours to unblock ongoing projects.

events.title: Strategy Storm (Case Series)
events.description: Bi-monthly case-practice sessions with live feedback and expected outcomes for consulting-style problem solving.
